verses.verse: And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> when<WG3753> the<WG3588> Lamb<WG721> opened<WG455> one<WG3391> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> seals,<WG4973> and<WG2532> I heard,<WG191> as it were<WG5613> the noise<WG5456> of thunder,<WG1027> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> four<WG5064> beasts<WG2226> saying,<WG3004> Come<WG2064> and<WG2532> see.<WG991>

And <WG2532> I saw,<WG1492> and<WG2532> behold<WG2400> a white<WG3022> horse:<WG2462> and<WG2532> he that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> him<WG846> had<WG2192> a bow;<WG5115> and<WG2532> a crown<WG4735> was given<WG1325> unto him:<WG846> and<WG2532> he went forth<WG1831> conquering,<WG3528> and<WG2532> to<WG2443> conquer.<WG3528>
And <WG2532> when<WG3753> he had opened<WG455> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> seal,<WG4973> I heard<WG191> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> beast<WG2226> say,<WG3004> Come<WG2064> and<WG2532> see.<WG991>

And <WG2532> there went out<WG1831> another<WG243> horse<WG2462> that was red:<WG4450> and<WG2532> power was given<WG1325> to him<WG846> that sat<WG2521> thereon<WG1909> <WG846> to take<WG2983> peace<WG1515> from<WG575> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> that<WG2443> they should kill<WG4969> one another:<WG240> and<WG2532> there was given<WG1325> unto him<WG846> a great<WG3173> sword.<WG3162>

And <WG2532> when<WG3753> he had opened<WG455> the<WG3588> third<WG5154> seal,<WG4973> I heard<WG191> the<WG3588> third<WG5154> beast<WG2226> say,<WG3004> Come<WG2064> and<WG2532> see.<WG991> And<WG2532> I beheld,<WG1492> and<WG2532> lo<WG2400> a black<WG3189> horse;<WG2462> and<WG2532> he that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> him<WG846> had<WG2192> a pair of balances<WG2218> in<WG1722> his<WG848> hand.<WG5495>

And <WG2532> I heard<WG191> a voice<WG5456> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the<WG3588> four<WG5064> beasts<WG2226> say,<WG3004> A measure<WG5518> of wheat<WG4621> for a penny,<WG1220> and<WG2532> three<WG5140> measures<WG5518> of barley<WG2915> for a penny;<WG1220> and<WG2532> see thou hurt<WG91> not<WG3361> the<WG3588> oil<WG1637> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> wine.<WG3631>

And <WG2532> when<WG3753> he had opened<WG455> the<WG3588> fourth<WG5067> seal,<WG4973> I heard<WG191> the voice<WG5456> of the<WG3588> fourth<WG5067> beast<WG2226> say,<WG3004> Come<WG2064> and<WG2532> see.<WG991>

And <WG2532> I looked,<WG1492> and<WG2532> behold<WG2400> a pale<WG5515> horse:<WG2462> and<WG2532> his<WG846> name<WG3686> that sat<WG2521> on<WG1883> him<WG846> was Death,<WG2288> and<WG2532> Hell<WG86> followed<WG190> with<WG3326> him.<WG846> And<WG2532> power<WG1849> was given<WG1325> unto them<WG846> over<WG1909> the<WG3588> fourth part<WG5067> of the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> to kill<WG615> with<WG1722> sword,<WG4501> and<WG2532> with<WG1722> hunger,<WG3042> and<WG2532> with<WG1722> death,<WG2288> and<WG2532> with<WG5259> the<WG3588> beasts<WG2342> of the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>

And <WG2532> when<WG3753> he had opened<WG455> the<WG3588> fifth<WG3991> seal,<WG4973> I saw<WG1492> under<WG5270> the<WG3588> altar<WG2379> the<WG3588> souls<WG5590> of them that were slain<WG4969> for<WG1223> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> for<WG1223> the<WG3588> testimony<WG3141> which<WG3739> they held: <WG2192>

And <WG2532> they cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> saying,<WG3004> How long,<WG2193> <WG4219> O Lord,<WG1203> holy<WG40> and<WG2532> true,<WG2228> dost thou not<WG3756> judge<WG2919> and<WG2532> avenge<WG1556> our<WG2257> blood<WG129> on<WG575> them that dwell<WG2730> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth?<WG1093>

And <WG2532> white<WG3022> robes<WG4749> were given<WG1325> unto every one of them;<WG1538> and<WG2532> it was said<WG4483> unto them,<WG846> that<WG2443> they should rest<WG373> yet<WG2089> for a little<WG3398> season,<WG5550> until<WG2193> <WG3757> their<WG848> fellow servants<WG4889> also<WG2532> and<WG2532> their<WG848> brethren,<WG80> that should<WG3195> be killed<WG615> as<WG5613> they were,<WG2532> <WG848> should be fulfilled.<WG4137>

And <WG2532> I beheld<WG1492> when<WG3753> he had opened<WG455> the<WG3588> sixth<WG1623> seal,<WG4973> and,<WG2532> lo,<WG2400> there was<WG1096> a great<WG3173> earthquake;<WG4578> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> sun<WG2246> became<WG1096> black<WG3189> as<WG5613> sackcloth<WG4526> of hair,<WG5155> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> moon<WG4582> became<WG1096> as<WG5613> blood;<WG129>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> stars<WG792> of heaven<WG3772> fell<WG4098> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> even as<WG5613> a fig tree<WG4808> casteth<WG906> her<WG848> untimely figs,<WG3653> when she is shaken<WG4579> of<WG5259> a mighty<WG3173> wind.<WG417>

And <WG2532> the heaven<WG3772> departed<WG673> as<WG5613> a scroll<WG975> when it is rolled together;<WG1507> and<WG2532> every<WG3956> mountain<WG3735> and<WG2532> island<WG3520> were moved<WG2795> out of<WG1537> their<WG848> places.<WG5117>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> kings<WG935> of the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> great men,<WG3175> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> rich men,<WG4145> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> chief captains,<WG5506> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> mighty men,<WG1415> and<WG2532> every<WG3956> bondman,<WG1401> and<WG2532> every<WG3956> free man,<WG1658> hid<WG2928> themselves<WG1438> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> dens<WG4693> and<WG2532> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> rocks<WG4073> of the<WG3588> mountains;<WG3735>

And <WG2532> said<WG3004> to the<WG3588> mountains<WG3735> and<WG2532> rocks,<WG4073> Fall<WG4098> on<WG1909> us,<WG2248> and<WG2532> hide<WG2928> us<WG2248> from<WG575> the face<WG4383> of him that sitteth<WG2521> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> throne,<WG2362> and<WG2532> from<WG575> the<WG3588> wrath<WG3709> of the<WG3588> Lamb: <WG721>
For <WG3754> the<WG3588> great<WG3173> day<WG2250> of his<WG848> wrath<WG3709> is come;<WG2064> and<WG2532> who<WG5101> shall be able<WG1410> to stand?<WG2476>
